alert.note: Alert for Blount; Sevier (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 11:58AM CST until January 12 at 12:30PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM EST FOR EAST CENTRAL BLOUNT AND SOUTHERN SEVIER COUNTIES... At 1258 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Maryville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Sevierville, Gatlinburg, Pigeon Forge, Pittman Center, Townsend, Wears Valley, Walland, Cades Cove, Elkmont and Roundtop Mountain State Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
